frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-one-third-window
frozen.shortDescription: Center or rotate  the current window by one third of the screen.
frozen.longDescription:
Center or rotate  the current window by one third of the screen.

Position and resize your windows in three with key shortcuts, center it to one third of the screen or rotate it around.
